text: Mohsen Kouhkan Rizi (, born 1957) is an Iranian economist and conservative politician who represents Lenjan district in the Parliament of Iran since 2016. He previously held the position from 1992 to 1996 and 2004 until 2008. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the 4th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Members of the 7th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Members of the 10th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Front of Followers of the Line of the Imam and the Leader politicians Category:Rastakhiz Party politicians Category:Secretaries-General of political parties in Iran
title: Mohsen Kouhkan
